thread.title: Gov. Brown strikes balance on union-backed bills
thread.title_full: Gov. Brown strikes balance on union-backed bills - San Francisco Chronicle

author: San Francisco Chronicle
title: Gov. Brown strikes balance on union-backed bills
text:
Photo: Rich Pedroncelli, Associated Press Gov. Jerry Brown signs one of hundreds of bills with deputy legislative secretary Graciela Castillo-Krings in Sacramento. Gov. Jerry Brown signs one of hundreds of bills with deputy...
Organized labor generally gets its way with the Democratic-controlled California Legislature. It’s a different story, however, when those union-backed bills reach the desk of Gov. Jerry Brown. Gov. Jerry Brown signs one of hundreds of bills with deputy legislative secretary Graciela Castillo-Krings in Sacramento. Gov. Jerry Brown signs one of hundreds of bills with deputy...
